Pre-Game Insights: The Philadelphia Phillies (87-58) face the Tampa Bay Rays (71-74) in Philadelphia at 6:40 p.m. ET on Wednesday, September 11, 2024.
Starting pitchers for the game are Zack Wheeler (RHP) for the Phillies and Shane Baz (RHP) for the Rays.
The Phillies average 1.2 home runs per game to rank ninth in MLB play with 176 total home runs.
The Rays' 132 home runs rank 28th in MLB this season.
Philadelphia has the fourth-best batting average in MLB (.260).
Tampa Bay has a team batting average of just .231 this season, which ranks 27th among MLB teams.
The Phillies score the fifth-most runs in baseball (711 total, 4.9 per game).
The Rays have scored the 28th-most runs in the league this season with just 559 (3.9 per game).
